CareFacilityBed.name: CareFacilityBed
CareFacilityBed.description: Represents information related to different bed types at a facility with associated care programs and products. This object is available in API version 58.0 and later.

AvailableBedCapacity.description: Represents the available bed capacity of an associated service at a facility.

BedTypeCodeId.description: Represents the type of bed associated with a facility.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the care facility bed.

ReferenceRecordId.description: Represents the reference record of the object that is associated with a bed in a facility.

TotalBedCapacity.description: Represents the total bed capacity of an associated service at a facility.
